title: can anyone gift me xayah please
body: i dont have time to play ofter so i have little ip please can someone gift her to me {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
We do not usually allow gifting posts on the Boards.  However, if you wish to ask for gifts for this promotion you can do so in this discussion:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/MPd8wJoe-xayah-and-rakan-gifting-thread
